resources.string:
"Awunabo oxhumana nabo ongabaveza.

Ukwengeza ongaxhumana nabo, thinta Imenyu, bese uthinta:
 

Ama-akhawunti ukwengeza noma ukumisa i-akhawunti enoxhumana nabo ongabavumelanisa kwi-SHIELD
 

Omusha oxhumana naye ukuze wakhe oxhumana naye ukusuka phansi
 

Ngenisa/khipha ukungenisa oxhumana nabo kusuka ekhadini lakho le-SIM noma le-SD
"

"Awunabo oxhumana nabo ongabaveza. (Uma usanda kwenezela i-akhawunti, kungathatha imizuzu embalwa ukuvumelanisa oxhumana nabo.)

Ukwengeza oxhumana nabo, thinta Imenyu, bese uthinta:
 

Ama-akhawunti ukwengeza noma ukumisa i-akhawunti enoxhumana nabo ongabavumelanisa kwi-SHIELD
 

Izinketho zokubonisa ukushintsha oxhumana nabo abazobonakala
 

Omusha oxhumana naye ukuze wakhe oxhumana naye ukusuka phansi
 

Ngenisa/khipha ukungenisa oxhumana nabo kusuka ekhadini lakho le-SIM noma le-SD
"

"Awunalo uhlu longathintana nabo ongalubonisa.

Ukuze unezele uhlu longathintana nabo, thinta Imenyu, bese uthinta:
 

Ama-akhawunti ukwengeza noma ukumisa i-akhawunti enoxhumana nabo ongabavumelanisa kwi-SHIELD
 

Omusha oxhumana naye ukuze wakhe oxhumana naye ukusuka phansi
 

Ngenisa/Khipha ukungenisa oxhumana nabo kusuka ekhadini lakho le-SD
"

"Awunabo oxhumana nabo ongabaveza. (Uma usanda kwenezela i-akhawunti, kungathatha imizuzu embalwa ukuvumelanisa oxhumana nabo.)

Ukwengeza oxhumana nabo, thinta Imenyu, bese uthinta:
 

Ama-akhawunti ukwengeza noma ukumisa i-akhawunti enoxhumana nabo ongabavumelanisa kwi-SHIELD
 

Izinketho zokubonisa ukushintsha oxhumana nabo abazobonakala
 

Omusha oxhumana naye ukuze wakhe oxhumana naye ukusuka phansi
 

Ngenisa/Khipha ukungenisa oxhumana nabo kusuka ekhadini lakho le-SD
"
Abekho othintana nabo abathumelekayo. Uma unabo oxhumana nabo kwi-SHIELD, abanye abahlinzeki be-data kungenzeka bangavumi ukuthi oxhumana nabo bathunyelwe.
